quest.name: Children of the Derelicts
journal:
 Quest Sync
Sristialla appears to be in considerable distress.

dialogue.name: SRISTIALLA
dialogue.text: Oh, stranger, please tell me you saw a group of four children while making your way here. I swear, they vanished in the space of an eyeblink!

dialogue.name: SRISTIALLA
dialogue.text: I've told them it's dangerous to wander about by themselves, what with the damage from the riot and the sheer drop to the ocean below, but they never listen. And now I can't find them anywhere...

dialogue.name: SRISTIALLA
dialogue.text: Would you please help me search for them? The longer they're left to their own devices, the greater the chance that they'll come to harm.

dialogue.name: SRISTIALLA
dialogue.text: Honestly, I take my eyes off of them for a single moment...

dialogue.name: CHILDA3522
dialogue.text: Mother wants us home? But we're playing hide-and-seek!

dialogue.name: CHILDC3522
dialogue.text: Tell Mother that we're not going near the ocean, so we'll be fine. And tell me if you find anyone else!

dialogue.name: CHILDA3522
dialogue.text: We'll go home when we're done playing!

dialogue.name: CHILDC3522
dialogue.text: If she wants us home faster, she can help me look...

dialogue.name: SRISTIALLA
dialogue.text: Oh, for the love of─ But I'm glad that they're safe. Thank you.

dialogue.name: SRISTIALLA
dialogue.text: I may be a bit too cautious, I admit. But you must understand, we have no way of knowing what's going on above. When that monster suddenly appeared in the sky, I didn't know what to think. And what if there are more?

dialogue.name: SRISTIALLA
dialogue.text: I'm their mother─it's my job to keep them safe. And I will. Oh, I am going to make them scrub so many pots for this...
